file.name: health-check.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  - url: 'http://{host}:{port}/dae'
info:
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Daisy status
  description: >-
    Check whether the daisy cluster is alive, and to query the packaging
    information of the current service.
paths:
  /ping:
    get:
      summary: Check whether the daisy cluster is alive
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/pingResp'
  /info:
    get:
      summary: query the packaging information of the current service
      responses:
        '200':
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/infoResp'
components:
  schemas:
    pingResp:
      type: object
      properties:
        status:
          type: string
          description: Server status status
    infoResp:
      type: object
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
          description: Server name
        time:
          type: string
          description: Server build time
        version:
          type: string
          description: Current version
